channel.title: Bad Company 2's minor irritations.
channel.description:
1. PC CROSSHAIR
sure, pc crosshair has to be like COUNTER STRIKE or some shit but jesus christ, I love the circle crosshair so much. The circle crosshair was nice and let me know exactly if I could spray to kill someone, or had to aim down the sights more than the 'cross'hair.
2. Lack of commo rose, easy spotting.
Sure, who doesn't like to spam the Q button a million times and spot the entire enemy team without even seeing them. I would like the old commo rose or a simpler COMMO rose, so i can tell me mates to move up or mount that vehicle instead of freakin spamming q and hoping i say the right thing
3. Recon not being a sniper
Okay, the sniper can use SHOTGUNS and other unlockables.
Wait this is a good thing, nevermind.
4. No jets?
Okay, let me get this straight, there was PLANES in battlefield 1943, but no JETS in bad company 2?
:fffuuu:
These things aren't big enough problems to make the game a bad game. Just some things that irritate me because dice is turning battlefield into COD or some shit.

item.title: Bad Company 2's minor irritations.
item.dc:creator: busterofwar
item.description:
Damn this game!
I have only played “Squad Deathmatch” so far however I always seem to be put with a bunch of bad squad members. They do not communicate at all and are either spamming grenade launchers at random or camping with a sniper.
I don’t actually mind the sniping however when they do it facing the out of bounds section of the map I want to cry.
Basically I am looking for some people to play with who communicate through either mic or text and have at least a little skill.

Feel free to add me!
